title: The Mole
blocka: When threat comes into play, add progress equal to Espionage.
blockb: xxACTION Brokering Peace (xxRAPPORT). If passed, add one progress.
blockc: xxAIR Raid. Remove one progress from this threat. If there are none to remove, spend 3 Food or lose 1 Stability.
blockd: xxCIRCLE Burn this threat if it has one or more progress.

title: Diplomatic Maneuverings
text: If you aren't building relationships - you will be left behind.
blocka: When threat comes into play, add xxTRACKING counters equal to Technology.
blockb: xxACTION Construction. Spend 9 xxTIMBER to add one xxTRACKING.
blockc: xxWATER Levy. Remove one xxTRACKING from this threat. If there are none to remove, lose 1 xxLUXURY die.
blockd: xxCIRCLE After mission, burn threat if it has any xxTRACKING.

title: Growing Resentment

title: See it for Myself
text: Menas scouts the northern wilds looking for signs of the Empire.
blocka: Attach to XYZ
blockb: xxACTION Signs of Sorcerous Danger. Spend 5 xxPROGRESS and make Menas weary. Then improve Menas's Motivation and burn this card.
blockc: xxAIR Veteran of the Old War. If Menas is at a North Oaks location, gain 2 xxPROGRESS.

title: The Necromancer
text: A cloaked figure hangs above the ground, limp and lifeless, but the power exuding from it tells you that it is not all that it seems.
blocka: Attach to Undari's Tomb
blockb: xxACTION Circle of Banishing. May take this action only if there are no Restless Dead at this location. Test (Lore 4). If passed, burn card.
blockc: xxAIR Enervation Spell. One character at a North Oaks location takes 2 xxBODY.
blockd: xxBUST Summoning Circle. If possible, find and play a Restless Dead card from the encounter deck before reshuffling.

title: Restless Dead
text: A mere shadow of a human, walking like a marionette yanked on strings.
blocka: Attach to Undari's Tomb.
blockb: xxACTION Battle the Undead. Test (Combat). For every two successes, burn one Restless Dead at this location.
blockc: xxEARTH The Hunger. Move one location right.
blockd: xxWATER Lose 1 xxPROGRESS at this location.

title: Restless Dead
text: A mere shadow of a human, walking like a marionette yanked on strings.

blockb: xxACTION Battle the Undead. Test (Combat). For every two successes, burn one Restless Dead at this location.
blockc: xxEARTH The Hunger. Move one location right.
blockd: xxWATER Lose 1 xxPROGRESS at this location.

title: Restless Dead
text: Dead, grey eyes stare back at you, liveliness long gone and replaced with a blank stare.
blocka: xxACTION Battle the Undead. Test (Combat). For every two successes, burn one Restless Dead at this location.
blockb: xxEARTH The Hunger. Move one location right.
blockc: xxWATER Lose 1 xxPROGRESS at this location.

title: Restless Dead
text: The soulless husk limping towards you reeks of rotting flesh.
blocka: xxACTION Battle the Undead. Test (Combat). For every two successes, burn one Restless Dead at this location.
blockb: xxEARTH The Hunger. Move one location right.
blockc: xxWATER Lose 1 xxPROGRESS at this location.

title: Restless Dead
text: The creature's face is sagging to one side, like wax placed in a flame, their features beyond recognition. The very image of them sends shivers down your spine.
blocka: xxACTION Battle the Undead. Test (Combat). For every two successes, burn one Restless Dead at this location.
blockb: xxEARTH The Hunger. Move one location right.
blockc: xxWATER Lose 1 xxPROGRESS at this location.

title: Restless Dead
text: The creature groans, the sound of bare bone scraping painfully against the earth echoing in your ears.
blocka: xxACTION Battle the Undead. Test (Combat). For every two successes, burn one Restless Dead at this location.
blockb: xxEARTH The Hunger. Move one location right.
blockc: xxWATER Lose 1 xxPROGRESS at this location.

title: Restless Dead
text: Clearly victims of a terrible pox, come back to share their misery.
blocka: xxACTION Battle the Undead. Test (Combat). For every two successes, burn one Restless Dead at this location.
blockb: xxEARTH The Hunger. Move one location right.
blockc: xxWATER Lose 1 xxPROGRESS at this location.

title: Grueling Wilds
text: The weather in North Oaks is wild and unpredictable.
blocka: xxACTION Risky Shelter. Test (Survival 2). If passed, burn card.
blockb: xxFIRE Extreme Fatigue. Spend 1 xxFOOD or one character at a North Oaks location is weary.

title: The Standing Stone
text: Scribbled on a stone are what appear to be coded Imperial messages. Who from Red Bank is sending these messages?
blocka: Gain xxPROGRESS equal to xxRISK and burn card.

title: The Last Necromancer
text: There are signs that the Necromancer of North Oaks was not alone. But was he master... or servant?
blocka: Take xxBODY equal to xxRISK and burn card.

title: Wandering Sprite
text: Out of the mists, a shimmering figure appears, no bigger than a toad.
blocka: Gain xxMANA dice equal to xxRISK and burn card.

text: Scattered mines from old Amber Hand outposts can still be found in the forest.

title: Sudden Storm
text: Stop whining and keep moving! You want to freeze to death?

title: A Failed Defense
text: The casualties of a long forgotten war echo their pain and anger into the forest.

title: Forest Boar
text: Hey Keel, could you peek your head in there and see if it's empty?

title: Rocky Terrain
text: I know! But your footing doesn't look so good!
blocka: Test (Survival 2). If you pass, gain 2 xxPROGRESS. Otherwise, take 2 xxBODY.

title: Ile
text: Ile is best equipped to see through the veil of sorcery. She harbors anger from being separated from her people, the Moonriders.
blocka: Attach to Horsethief Meadows.
blockb: xxACTION Ending Ile's Curse. Test (Lore 2). If passed, burn card.
blockc: xxWATER Ile's Gift. Gain 1 xxMANA die.

title: Past Deals
text: Ask yourself, aren't you also responsible for how bad things have become?
blocka: Attach to Hogel Manor.
blockb: xxACTION Look Toward the Future. Test (Command 3). If passed, burn card.
blockc: xxEARTH Lose 1 xxPROGRESS at this location.

title: Family Honor
text: What is your great society if it doesn't value families?
blocka: Attach to Hogel Manor.
blockb: xxACTION Build Bridges. Test (Rapport 3). If passed, burn card.
blockc: xxEARTH Lose 1 xxPROGRESS at this location.

title: Dashen

blocka: xxACTION Test (Command 3). If passed, burn card.

title: Hogel
text: Hah! You think Arban rules the Sunriders? But who has the will of the people?

title: Radia's Dark Lore
text: Radia is the sage and oracle of Gravewood. She whispers in your ear about Red Bank's dark past, and a growing danger in your midst.
blocka: Optionally, you may gain three xxSECRETS and one character at a Gravewood mission locaion is shattered.

title: Mysterious Technology
text: A black obsidian key, shimmering with highlights of brass, capable of opening almost any lock.
blocka: Play on a character at a Gravewood location.

title: Samo's Humiliations
text: What kind of dung brain doesn't know what snow cat tracks look like? How is it possible that you have survived this long, bereft of both wits and beauty?
blocka: If Samo is in play, Test (Command 2). If you fail, all characters making the test are angry.

title: Imperial Agent
text: They have been caught this time, but what does this presage for the future?
blocka: Gain 1 xxFORTUNE.

title: The Island of Apples
text: The gods made the island invisible to shield Yari's people from the Sunriders. But the Yarifolk became vain - and stayed too long - and the gods turned Yari into The Weaver, guarding his spider silk of invisibility amongst the undead.
blocka: Gain 1 xxFORTUNE.

title: Verdant Fields
text: The springs are lush with life, and all is well in the world. Time for rest.
blocka: Gain 1 xxFORTUNE.

title: Keeper of Swords
text: I'm not sure if your fighting spirit is up to the task? Sad, really.
blocka: Test (Command 1). If you fail, gain two xxDISCORD.

title: Sdila's Hunt
text: The leader of First Haven kept an unrelenting pace through the traces of snow and mud, in singular pursuit of his quarry. While the hunt continued, so did the judgement.

title: Graycloak
text: I've stabbed people for far less. That's the reason I took this job. That and they threatened to kill my family.

title: A Cold Place
blocka: The streets of Eastkeep are punishing, but secrets are there for the taking - if you're willing to pay the price. You may make a character at this location weary to add three xxPROGRESS. Then burn card.

title: Autarch Spy
text: Thea no longer represents our true interests! Glory to the real Red Bank!
blocka: xxEARTH Move one location right.
blockb: xxWATER Sabotage. Remove 2 Mission Progress.

title: Violent Locals
text: The boy's death must be avenged!
blocka: xxWATER Move one location left.
blockb: xxFIRE Unruly Mayhem! Take 2 Discord.

title: Violent Locals
text: The boy's death must be avenged!
blocka: xxWATER Move one location left.
blockb: xxFIRE Unruly Mayhem! Take 2 Discord.

title: Violent Locals
text: The boy's death must be avenged!
blocka: xxWATER Move one location left.
blockb: xxFIRE Unruly Mayhem! Take 2 Discord.

title: Unalive and Alone
text: I never asked for this existance. And I intend to find out why I came back.
blocka: Discard if Oniri is not in either party.
blockb: xxWATER Oniri takes a Condition.
blockc: xxAIR Add 2 Mission Progress.

title: The Embattled Leader
blocka: Discard if Thea is not in either party.
blockb: xxAIR Thea is weary.
blockc: xxFIRE Burn one Conspiracy Spreads obstacle.

title: Raid Under Sparrow Keep
blocka: Aided by a team of guards, raids are conducted against Sparrow Keep (xxCOMBAT). If passed, add 3 Mission Progress to Sparrow Keep. If failed, one character making this test is Wounded. After resolving test, burn this card.

title: Traces of Power
blocka: The source of the magic has been found, but can it be weakened (xxLORE)? If passed, add 2 Progress to Veil Ward threat. After resolving test, burn this card.

title: Funeral Dirge
blocka: Take 2 Discord then burn this card.

title: Searching for Clues
blocka: There are signs of Imperial activity (xxSURVIVAL). If successful, add 2 Mission Progress. If failed, one character making test is Exhausted.

title: Community Building
blocka: There is no reasoning with people who are angry and afraid (xxCOMMAND). If passed, add 2 Mission Progress. Otherwise, lose 1 Food die.

title: Oniri's Aid
blocka: This could be fruitful, or a wild goose chase (xxSURVIVAL). If passed, add 1 Mission Progress. Otherwise, take 1 Discord.

title: Purging the Filth
blocka: Press the attack! While we have the initiative (xxCOMBAT)! If failed, one character making this test takes 3 Physical Stress.

title: Sorcerous Drain
blocka: Conserving magical energy is not easy (xxLORE). If failed, lose 1 Mana die.

title: Aid from Burgan Vale
blocka: Gain 2 Mana dice.

title: A Father's Vengeance
blocka: Take 1 Discord for each Violent Locals obstacle in play.

title: The Subtect
blocka: Attach to The Wrenhouse.
blockb: xxCIRCLE When The Subtect is burned, add 2 Progress to The Weaver of Secrets obstacle, if it is in play.
blockc: xxAIR Remove 2 Mission Progress.

title: Zarrah
blocka: Attach to Goldspike.
blockb: xxAIR Remove 2 Mission Progress.
blockc: xxEARTH Take 1 Discord for each issue at this location.

title: High Society
blocka: Attach to Goldspike.
blockb: xxFIRE Lose 1 Luxury die.

title: Strong Arm Tactics
blocka: xxAIR Take 1 Discord.

title: Viator
blocka: xxFIRE Remove 2 Mission Progress.
blockb: xxWATER Remove 2 Discord.

title: Sut
blocka: xxFIRE Take 1 Discord.

title: Global Stability
blocka: xxFIRE Remove 2 Mission Progress.

title: Long Shadows
blocka: xxAIR Remove 2 Mission Progress.

title: Eastern Isolationism
blocka: xxEARTH Take 1 Discord.

title: The Sapphire Djinn
blocka: xxCIRCLE When the Sapphire Djinn is burned, add 2 progress to the Veil Ward threat.
blockb: xxEARTH Take 1 Discord.
blockc: xxWATER Gain 1 Mana die.

title: Moment of Clarity
blocka: xxAIR Take 1 Discord.
blockb: xxEARTH Add 2 Mission Progress.

title: Yasmina'a Concern
text: If you'll allow me to speak candidly - this threat is far greater than you realize. I have been sent to help you.
blocka: You may spend 4 Mana to add two progress to any obstacle and burn this card.

title: Viator's Charm
text: Why, but of course. Tonight is a night to be merry! Worries should be left at the door. A small little town like Red Bank can cause no disturbance here.
blocka: Either spend 4 Luxury or one character at this location is Angry. Then burn card.

title: Viator's Sympathy
text: Every city is of importance. Lily Manor will do everything in its power to aid Red Bank. Any kingdom, large or small, is deserving of peace.
blocka: You may spend 4 Luxury to draw two asset cards and burn this card.

title: Foreign Spells
blocka: Test (xxTHIEVERY). If successful, add 1 Progress from the Veil Ward threat.

title: Wine Harvest
blocka: Test (xxRAPPORT). If failed, lose 1 Luxury die.

title: Envoys from Burgan Vale
blocka: Test (xxTACTICS). If successful, add 2 Mission Progress. Otherwise, take 1 Discord.

title: Pillow Talk
blocka: Test (xxRAPPORT). If successful, draw the top asset card. Otherwise, take 1 Discord.

title: Poison!
blocka: Test (xxTHIEVERY). If failed, one character taking this test is Wounded.

title: Unified Front
blocka: Test (xxTACTICS). If successful, add 2 Mission Progress. Otherwise, take 1 Discord.

title: Akilah
blocka: Test (xxRAPPORT). If successful, add 2 Mission Progress. Otherwise, one character making this test is Frustrated.

title: The Drug Trade
blocka: Test (xxDISGUISE). If failed, one character making this test is Exhausted.

title: Grave Concerns
blocka: Test (xxTHIEVERY). If failed, take 1 Discord.

title: Pleasure Dome
blocka: Test (xxRAPPORT). If failed, lose 1 Luxury die.

title: Rising Darkness
blocka: Test (xxDISGUISE). If failed, take 1 Discord.
